.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CursorAnchorInfo extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type CursorAnchorInfo = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: Positional information about the text insertion point and characters in the composition string.

remarks.para: Positional information about the text insertion point and characters in the composition string.

This class encapsulates locations of the text insertion point and the composition string in the screen coordinates so that IMEs can render their UI components near where the text is actually inserted.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the vertical baseline position of the insertion marker, in the local coordinates that will be transformed with #getMatrix() when rendered on the screen.
Docs.value: y coordinate that is compatible with Layout#getLineBaseline(int). java.lang.Float.NaN if not specified.

Docs.summary: Returns the horizontal start of the insertion marker, in the local coordinates that will be transformed with #getMatrix() when rendered on the screen.
